page.title: 10FARMING IN STANWAY & COPFORD
page.content: The warm summers are well suited to the production of{soft fruit}and although early crops need{protection with plastic clotches and wind breaks, they may arrive up to a month ahead of the main crop. A portion of the early crops are picked for{whole sale markets,}the rest is given over to retail sale in the form of{"pick your own".}The main crop is{strawberries}which become available from July to September but most soft fruits as well as{orchard {fruits,}are available in season. Recently there has been a move to include{vegetables}such as beans,potatoes and even sweetcorn in the rotation. By making the public do the harvesting labour costs are reduced.
